title: Redesign the plugin layout
body:
# Figma plugin design 

**Title in the window header: "Conduit"**

### Layout-specs: 

1. Each component is placed in a vertical stack. Width 12px spacing between each item. 
2. Plugin size will be: w/h 350x500 

- Header-component
    - Logo-icon: (size: 64x64, url: root/logo_dark.svg or root/logo_light, align: left) 
    - TitleText: "Conduit"
    - SubtitleText: "Design at the speed of thought"
- Tab-toggle: options: "Connection", "About" (size: width: 100%)
    - two rounded capsule buttons. 
    - selected has a different shade
    - background is also rounded capsule, with some padding
    - font color shades are different for selected and not selected
    - text in buttons are centered, some padding around text
    - buttons are grouped horizontally, and the group is centered horizontally
- Connect-view: (default selected)
    - Websocket-component: (100% width)
        - Title: text: "Websocket-port:" (top left)
        - single-lined-input-textfield: default value: "3055" (bellow title, left aligned)
        - Connect button: "Connect" or "Disconnect" (right-aligned of input-textfield)
    - Toggle-component: (100% width)
        - toggle-button: checked unchecked, default is checked, (top left aligned)
        - description text: text: "Auto connect to server" (right of toggle button).
    - Status-component: (100% width)
        - Multiline textfield, left alined, 
        - Text for Multiline textfield: Connected to server on port "\(port_value)" in channel: "\(channel_value)"
        - Border and fill: Green when connected, red when disconnected. Border: is a different shade than the fill etc
- About-view: (this is shown when we toggle to "about", hidden by default)
    - TitleText: "About Conduit"
    - multiline-text: "This plugin allows you to use any agentic AI app that supports MCP. Enabling AI assisted design operations. Based on work by Sonny and Arinspunk newline newline Version: \(version_value), newline newline  How to use: newline 1. Start server in terminal: "bun socket" the plugin will auto-connect if this is enabled. newline 2. Press the "copy channel" button in the plugin. 3. Make sure you add the mcp config to your AI agent. paste this in the mcp-config file: "mcp{conduit,autoconnect, etc}" newlinePrompt:  4. talk to figma on channel: paste your channel id. And then begin chatting with your design.  the " (sonny and arinspunk should be links to their user accounts on github, the links should have a different shade than the rest of the text)
